ygData.subject: Surefall Glade
ygData.msgSnippet: Not that any discussion about Surefall Glade is really relavent to this list, but does anyone know of any quests that are good to raise faction with Surefall
ygData.messageBody:
Not that any discussion about Surefall Glade is really relavent to
this list, but does anyone know of any quests that are good to raise
faction with Surefall Glade? I killed Gnasher Furgutt in the hopes of
getting the medal of merit (+5 charisma), which I can use to make more
money when I trade with merchants, but I just got the head. Well, the
guy in SG didn't want it from me. I have to be better than indif to
do that quest. So, I was going to try to raise it to get them to
amiably, or something. Any suggestions?

I got the bottle of nitrates to deliver to the lady in WK but I
don't know where she lives. He just said, "in a hut by the road on
the way to highhold pass". feh.
